artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Published by Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: building on stilts; left side upper section supported by pillars; central staircase leading to upper level; "ECOLE" above entry at top of stairs; "GARÇON" on left side, "FILLES" on right side; clock at top of central facade; yellow door lower level below stairs
